casebody.data:
Friday Investments, LLC
v.
Bally Total Fitness of the Mid-Atlantic, Inc., et al. 248PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 1, 2017 Lisa G. Godfrey, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Peter R. Fenn, Attorney at Law, Ira H. Grolman, Attorney at Law, Stacy C. Cordes, Attorney at Law, for Bally Total Fitness of the Mid-Atlantic, Inc., et al. Keith B. Nichols, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Samuel S. Kohn, Attorney at Law, for Friday Investments, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 31st of January 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of February 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 23rd day of February 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
